PaymentDelivery.title: Payment & Delivery Methods
PaymentDelivery.bankTransferDesc: We accept transfers key BCA and Mandiri. Account details will be provided at checkout.
PaymentDelivery.ewalletDesc: Scan QRIS or pay via OVO & Gopay for instant confirmation.
PaymentDelivery.shippingDesc: We ship nationwide via JNE and J&T Express.
PaymentDelivery.instantDesc: Same-day delivery via Gojek or Grab for Surabaya area.
PaymentDelivery.pickupDesc: Pick up your order directly at our store in Surabaya.

Shop.title: Our Premium Fabric Collection
Shop.description: Discover handpicked, high-quality fabrics perfect for your next masterpiece. From luxurious silk to breathable cotton, each material is carefully selected to bring your creative vision to life.

Contact.title: Contact Us
Contact.aboutText: Scorpio Textiles is a premium fabric provider based in Surabaya. We specialize in high-quality materials including Silk, Cotton, Linen, and Velvet. Our mission is to provide the finest fabrics for fashion designers, tailors, and textile enthusiasts across Indonesia and beyond.
